name: Taking Stock
description:
You are not the Little Guy. However, you must command the Little Guy.

Your job is to assist the Little Guy, who is working under the supervision of their Supervisor, in restocking the tables of their fruit & vegetable shop. Pick up fresh produce off the floor! Put down fresh produce on the table! Help the Little Guy become the hero their local retailer needs!

Use the on-screen buttons to move, pick up / put down items, and reset the game.

Made for the Goblin Bunker Game Jam May 2022

Credits:

  • Sprites & tilesets from GB Style Farm and Town Tileset
  • Music & sound effects from CanariPack 8BIT TopDown
  • Font from Pixel 64
  • Inspiration from Lightbot, Human Resource Machine, and other programming edutainment games I played as a child
  • My friends & family for non-specific support and encouragement
